fields.name: channels
javadoc: Contains all endpoints added to this NetworkSystem

fields.name: connections
javadoc: A list containing all NetworkManager instances of all endpoints

fields.name: running
javadoc: True if this NetworkSystem has never had his endpoints terminated

methods.name: startMemoryChannel
javadoc: Adds a channel that listens locally

methods.name: startTcpServerListener
javadoc: Adds a channel that listens on publicly accessible network ports

methods.name: stop
javadoc: Shuts down all open endpoints (with immediate effect?)

methods.name: tick
javadoc: Will try to process the packets received by each NetworkManager, gracefully manage processing failures and cleans up dead connections
